Articles.Content:
![UkOsdFk.png](http://i.imgur.com/UkOsdFk.png)

**Su-35 Superflanker**

![XTUQSRh.png](http://i.imgur.com/XTUQSRh.png)

I've built a Su-35 in the past, but it was hardly a Su-35 because it was very ugly, and mainly, meh. Now I have a smoother version. The aerodynamics are very weird in this one (maybe because I rebuilt form the old version, rather than starting from scratch). I had to put a heavy rocket fuel tank and align engines in weird ways and add extra wings. All this aside, now it flies stable, but not particularly maneuverable.

[**DOWNLOAD**](http://www./download/tkv9rhpy4j47aka/Su-35%282%29.craft)

It also has missiles included in the download:

![paszqRg.gif](http://i.imgur.com/paszqRg.gif)

![JljX0qt.png](http://i.imgur.com/JljX0qt.png)

![6aRsOVK.png](http://i.imgur.com/6aRsOVK.png)

+Rep! Nice!

I've never had the patience to recolor the Kerbpaint schemes.
